alert.note: Alert for Fayette; Hardeman; Haywood; Tipton (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 13 at 4:39PM CDT until April 13 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Tipton County in western Tennessee... Northern Fayette County in western Tennessee... Northwestern Hardeman County in western Tennessee... Southern Haywood County in western Tennessee... * Until 530 PM CDT. * At 439 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Arlington, or 11 miles northeast of Cordova, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Bolivar, Whiteville, Somerville, Dancyville, Cloverport, Warren, Oakland, Mason, Gallaway, Toone, Braden, Yum Yum, Belmont, Taylor Chapel, Hickory Withe, Fayette Corners, Laconia, Cedar Chapel, Vildo and Longtown. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for western Tennessee. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for western Tennessee.
